name: krishna
comment: Add text on top of any picture on your device in just a few simple steps.  Great for adding device owner contact information to lock screen wallpaper.

tokens.value: Would you like to use the text below?

args.value: Would you like to use the text below?

tokens.value: Would you like to save this picture?

args.value: Would you like to save this picture?

tokens.value:
This app will let you overlay text on top of any picture saved on your device.  You will be prompted to save the new picture at the end of the process.

Tap Ok to select a picture.

args.value:
This app will let you overlay text on top of any picture saved on your device.  You will be prompted to save the new picture at the end of the process.

Tap Ok to select a picture.
